activities: BHS does business in Europe and Switzerland.  Through the BHS website the following contact information is collected from individuals seeking information about BHS products:  Name, Job Title, Address including Postal Code, Telephone Number, Fax Number and Email Address.  Individuals purchasing products from BHS also provide BHS with their credit card information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Electronic Components - (ELC)Machine Tools & Metal Working Eqpt - (MTL)General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)
personaldata: The following personal data collected by BHS is covered by the Safe Harbor Framework:  Customer name, Company name, Address, Telephone, Email, and credit card information to the extent it is collected.
privacyprograms: A self-regulatory program that adheres to Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.  See website noted above.
recoursemech: BHS agrees to cooperate with EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
